name: PubCrawl
description:
PubCrawl 

An arcade themed platform roguelite set in a pub.

Demo note:

There is still quite a bit of work to do, im releasing the demo to get feedback on the controls and concept. There is currently no perma progression, and a limited number of perks. PubCrawl will have much more content in a later release.

Thanks for checking it out!-

-Wubs
